channel.title: CDMX Rides on Srikanth Perinkulam

item.title: Dia de muertos ride
item.author: ssphugo@srkn.anonaddy.com (Srikanth Perinkulam)
item.description: Took the bike out for a spin right after the CLO trick or treat. Reforma and parts of Centro Historico were closed out for the monthly night ride and this one coincided with Dia de muertos. Quite a few people showed up and most of the route was a huge bicycle jam. Nevertheless some good time out on the roads in the nippy weather. Clocked around 11 miles.
